Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on Neilian Drive in front of the omnimous gates which serve as the entrance to the ancient Dragon's Citadel, on the north.
Room.LongDescription: A large gate seems to be open as you approach the Citadel. Many believe that the Citadel has been long abandoned, but no one has really ventured into the depths of the strange building. The Dragon's Citadel awaits those who dare to enter it.
